WorkItem.ClosedComment: While we do have a mechanism in place where we can support this, we don't have a list of every effect that is shared with another effect. If someone would like to gather this info and reopen this ticket with it attached, we can post this in. Until then, closing this ticket as a too low priority.
WorkItem.Description:
On my Priest during an Ony run, I noticed that only one of my trinket procs were activating. I am using both the Mithril Pocketwatch and the Sundial of the Exiled. After going to Wowhead, I noticed that they BOTH use the same proc; Now is the Time!. I looked up the other Brewfest Trinkets and noticed that 2 of the 3 other trinkets share the same proc as their Honor Trinket equivalent.
 
Currently the first 6 trinkets that I mentioned are being treated by Rawr as separate procs. However those three sets share similar procs and need to be adjusted as such.
 
[List]
 
A: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=49076 : Mithril Pocketwatch
B: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=40682 : Sundial of the Exiled
P: http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=60063 : Now is the Time!
 
A: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=49074 : Coren's Chromium Coaster
B: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=40684 : Mirror of Truth
P: http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=33648 : Reflection of Torment
 
A: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=49078 : Ancient Pickled Egg
B: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=40685 : The Egg of Mortal Essence
P: http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=33953 : Essence of Life
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Trinkets that Share Procs don't conflict properly

Comments.Message: Hina (or anyone else willing) can you investigate more combinations and add them in the formatting I set up? If we do it we'll need a list of all the effects that share procs.
